controls.name: Personnel Termination and Transfer
controls.description: When individual employment is terminated: Disable system access within the organization-defined time period, terminate or revoke authenticators and credentials associated with the individual, and retrieve security-related system property. When individuals are reassigned or transferred to other positions in the organization: Review and confirm the ongoing operational need for current logical and physical access authorizations.

criteria.description: Ensure system access is disabled and credentials are revoked when employment is terminated, and access authorizations are reviewed during personnel transfers.

controls.name: Physical Access Authorizations
controls.description: Develop, approve, and maintain a list of individuals with authorized access to the facility where the system resides. Issue authorization credentials for facility access. Review the facility access list at an organization-defined frequency. Remove individuals from the facility access list when access is no longer required.

criteria.description: Ensure there is a maintained list of individuals with facility access, that credentials are issued, and access lists are regularly reviewed and updated.

controls.name: Monitoring Physical Access
controls.description: Monitor physical access to the facility where the system resides to detect and respond to physical security incidents. Review physical access logs at an organization-defined frequency and upon occurrence of specific events or potential indicators of events.

criteria.description: Verify that physical access to the facility is monitored, and access logs are regularly reviewed and analyzed for incidents.

criteria.description: Check that physical access control measures are in place, including verification of authorizations, use of control systems, and maintenance of audit logs.

criteria.description: Verify that access to system distribution and transmission lines is controlled to prevent unauthorized physical access.
